title: Our new bed
content: Our new bed is amazing. It's the Nyvoll from Ikea in light gray. It was a battle putting it together, but not sleeping on the floor makes it so worth it! The first few nights we slept in it I'd wake up and forget where I was (and then be pleasantly surprised when I'd remember Oh, that's rightâ€”we have a bed now!), and in a fun way, it still kinda feels like we're crashing in a hotel. Our striped duvet cover is from West Elm and our sheets are from PB Teen. Just a note on the sheets, they are such a steal! At first I thought it was a mistake that the queen sheets were just $30 while the full sheets were $79, but they're still there on the website :)
